title: Ex-NBA Star Yao Ming Encourages Chinese To Stop Buying Ivory
teaser: Retired NBA player Yao Ming has embarked on a mission to stop the poaching of elephants and rhinos in Africa. Yao stars in the Animal Planet documentary Saving Africa's Giants With Yao Ming.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
